public ResultSet select(String table,
                        String selectcols,
                        String[] whereCols,
                        String[] whereVals,
                        String[] logicalConnectors)
                 throws SQLException
Selects and returns a result set based on the given conditions. To be used when the WHERE clause values contain values entered by the user.

Parameters:
String - The table name
String[] - The set of columns that needs to be selected
String[] - The set of WHERE clause conditions
String[] - The set of WHERE clause values
String[] - The set of logical connectors like AND , OR etc
Returns:
java.sql.ResultSet
Throws:
SQLException
